name: Crumb Quest
description:
Overview

You, a bug, are on the quest for a rumoured mammoth feast! Everything looks like it's out to get you, you may want to keep your distance! But don't worry, friends can be made along the way that help you out.

System Requirements

Crumb Quest requires the following PC specs:

Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater

Memory: 8GB+ RAM

Operating System: Windows 10 or macOS (Both Intel and Silicon are Supported)

Controls First Person/Third Person

W - Move Forward

S - Move Backward

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Left Shift - Sprint

Mouse - Look

Esc - Pause
